alive.message:
*👑 Artoria Bot is Active!*

*Version:* {version}
*Status:* Online
*Mode:* Public

*🌟 Features:*
• Group Management
• Antilink Protection
• Fun Commands
• And more!

Type *.menu* for full command list

help.menu:
Menu: .help, .menu, .ping, .alive, .owner, .tts, .joke, .quote, .fact, .weather, .news, .attp, .lyrics, .8ball, .groupinfo, .staff, .vv, .trt, .ss, .jid
Admin: .ban, .promote, .demote, .mute, .unmute, .delete, .kick, .warnings, .warn, .antilink, .antibadword, .clear, .tag, .tagall, .chatbot, .resetlink, .antitag, .welcome, .goodbye
Owner: .mode, .autostatus, .clearsession, .antidelete, .cleartmp, .update, .setpp, .autoreact, .autotyping, .autoread
Image: .blur, .simage, .sticker, .removebg, .remini, .crop, .tgsticker, .meme, .take, .emojimix
Game: .tictactoe, .hangman, .guess, .trivia, .answer, .truth, .dare
Fun: .compliment, .insult, .flirt, .shayari, .goodnight, .roseday, .character, .wasted, .ship, .simp, .stupid
Downloader: .play, .song, .instagram, .facebook, .tiktok, .video, .ytmp4

tts.usage: Please provide text for TTS conversion.

joke.error: Sorry, I cannot fetch a joke right now.

quote.error: ❌ Failed to get quote. Please try again later!

fact.error: Sorry, I cannot fetch a fact right now.

weather.error: Sorry, I cannot fetch weather right now.

news.error: Sorry, I cannot fetch news right now.

lyrics.usage: 🔍 Please enter a song name to get lyrics! Usage: *lyrics <song name>*
lyrics.not_found: ❌ Sorry, I cannot find lyrics for "{song}".

translate.usage:
*TRANSLATOR*

Usage:
1. Reply to a message with: .translate <lang> or .trt <lang>
2. Or type: .translate <text> <lang> or .trt <text> <lang>

Examples:
.translate hello fr
.trt hello fr

Language codes:
fr - French
es - Spanish
de - German
it - Italian
pt - Portuguese
ru - Russian
ja - Japanese
ko - Korean
zh - Chinese
ar - Arabic
hi - Hindi
translate.no_text: ❌ No text found to translate. Please provide text or reply to a message.
translate.error:
❌ Failed to translate text. Please try again later.

Usage:
1. Reply to a message with: .translate <lang> or .trt <lang>
2. Or type: .translate <text> <lang> or .trt <text> <lang>

ss.usage:
*SCREENSHOT TOOL*

*.ss <url>*
*.ssweb <url>*
*.screenshot <url>*

Take screenshot of any website

Example:
.ss https://google.com
.ssweb https://google.com
.screenshot https://google.com
ss.invalid_url: ❌ Please provide a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
ss.error:
❌ Failed to take screenshot. Please try again in a few minutes.

Possible reasons:
• Invalid URL
• Website blocks screenshots
• Website is down
• API service temporarily unavailable

ban.usage: Please mention a user or reply to their message to ban!

promote.usage: Please mention a user or reply to their message to promote!

demote.usage: ❌ Error: Please mention a user or reply to their message to demote!
demote.error: ❌ Failed to demote user. Ensure bot is admin and has sufficient permissions.

kick.usage: Please mention a user or reply to their message to kick!

mute.usage: Please make the bot an admin first.
mute.not_admin: Only group admins can use the mute command.
mute.success: Group has been muted for {minutes} minutes.
mute.error: An error occurred while muting/unmuting the group. Please try again.

delete.usage: Please reply to a message you want to delete.
delete.not_admin: I need to be admin to delete messages.
delete.admin_only: Only admins can use the .delete command.

warn.usage: ❌ Error: Please mention a user or reply to their message to warn!
warn.kick: User {user} has been kicked due to repeated warnings!
warn.rate_limit: ❌ Rate limit reached. Please try again in a few seconds.
warn.permissions: ❌ Failed to warn user. Ensure bot is admin and has sufficient permissions.

warnings.usage: Please mention a user to check their warnings.

clear.error: An error occurred while deleting messages.

tag.usage: Please make the bot an admin first.

tagall.admin_only: Only admins can use the .tagall command.
tagall.no_participants: No participants found in the group.

chatbot.usage:
*CHATBOT SETTINGS*

*.chatbot on*
Enable chatbot

*.chatbot off*
Disable chatbot in this group
chatbot.already_enabled: *Chatbot is already enabled for this group*
chatbot.enabled: *Chatbot has been enabled for this group*
chatbot.already_disabled: *Chatbot is already disabled for this group*
chatbot.disabled: *Chatbot has been disabled for this group*
chatbot.no_permission: ❌ Only group admins or bot owner can use this command.
chatbot.thinking:
Hmm, let me think... 🤔
I'm having trouble processing your request right now.
chatbot.confused: Oops! 😅 I'm a bit confused there. Can you try asking again?

resetlink.admin_only: ❌ Only admins can use this command!
resetlink.bot_admin: ❌ Bot must be admin to reset group link!

welcome.group_only: This command can only be used in groups.

goodbye.group_only: This command can only be used in groups.

clearsession.owner_only: ❌ This command is only available to the owner!
clearsession.optimizing: 🔍 Optimizing session files for better performance...

cleartmp.owner_only: ❌ This command is only available to the owner!

update.owner_only: Only bot owner or sudo can use .update
update.done: ✅ Update completed. Type .ping to check the new version.
update.restarted:
✅ Successfully restarted
Type .ping to check the latest version.

setpp.owner_only: ❌ This command is only available to the owner!
setpp.usage: ⚠️ Please reply to an image with the .setpp command!
setpp.invalid: ❌ The replied message must contain an image!

blur.usage: ❌ Please reply to an image message
blur.usage2: ❌ Please reply to an image or send an image with .blur as caption
blur.error: ❌ Failed to blur image. Please try again later.

simage.usage: Reply to a sticker with .simage to convert it.
simage.error: An error occurred while converting the sticker.

sticker.usage: Please reply to an image/video with .sticker, or send an image/video with .sticker as caption.
sticker.error: Failed to download media. Please try again.
sticker.failed: Failed to create sticker! Try again later.

removebg.usage:
❌ The provided URL is invalid.

Usage: `.removebg https://example.com/image.jpg`
removebg.usage2:
📸 *Remove Background Command*

Usage:
• `.removebg <image_url>`
• Reply to an image with `.removebg`
• Send an image with `.removebg`

Example: `.removebg https://example.com/image.jpg`

remini.usage:
❌ The provided URL is invalid.

Usage: `.remini https://example.com/image.jpg`
remini.usage2:
📸 *AI Enhancement Command*

Usage:
• `.remini <image_url>`
• Reply to an image with `.remini`
• Send an image with `.remini`

Example: `.remini https://example.com/image.jpg`

crop.usage: Please reply to an image/video/sticker with .crop, or send an image/video/sticker with .crop as caption.
crop.error: Failed to download media. Please try again.
crop.failed: Failed to crop sticker! Try with an image.

tgsticker.usage:
⚠️ Please provide a Telegram sticker URL!

Example: .tg https://t.me/addstickers/Porcientoreal
tgsticker.invalid: ❌ Invalid URL! Make sure it's a Telegram sticker URL.
tgsticker.error:
❌ Failed to process Telegram sticker!
Make sure:
1. URL is correct
2. Sticker pack exists
3. Sticker pack is public

meme.error: ❌ Failed to fetch meme. Please try again later.

emojimix.not_mixable: ❌ These emojis cannot be mixed! Try different ones.
emojimix.error:
❌ Failed to mix emojis! Make sure you use valid emojis.

Example: .emojimix 😎+🥰

play.usage: What song would you like to download?
play.progress: _Please wait, your download is in progress_
play.error: Failed to fetch audio from API. Please try again later.
play.failed: Download failed. Please try again later.

song.usage: What song would you like to download?
song.error: Failed to fetch download link. Try again later.
song.invalid: Failed to get valid download link from API.
song.bad_status: Failed to download song file from server (bad status).
song.small: Song file seems invalid (too small). Please try again.
song.failed: Download failed. Please try again later.

instagram.usage: Please provide an Instagram link for the video.
instagram.invalid: That is not a valid Instagram link. Please provide a valid Instagram post, reel, or video link.
instagram.no_media: ❌ No media found in the provided link. The post may be private or the link invalid.
instagram.no_valid: ❌ No valid media to download. This may be a private post or scraper failed.
instagram.error: ❌ An error occurred while processing the Instagram request. Please try again.

facebook.usage:
Please provide a Facebook video URL.
Example: .fb https://www.facebook.com/...
facebook.invalid: That is not a Facebook link.
facebook.error: Sorry, the API is not responding correctly. Please try again later!
facebook.wrong_data: Wrong Facebook data. Make sure the video exists.
facebook.api_error: An error occurred. API may be down. Error: {error}

tiktok.usage: Please provide a TikTok link for the video.
tiktok.invalid: That is not a valid TikTok link. Please provide a valid TikTok video link.
tiktok.no_media: ❌ Failed to download TikTok video. All download methods failed. Please try with a different link or check if the video is available.
tiktok.failed: ❌ Failed to download TikTok video. Please try with a different link.
tiktok.error: ❌ An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.

video.usage: What video would you like to download?
video.invalid: This is not a valid YouTube link!
video.api_error: Failed to fetch video from API.
video.cdn_error: Failed to download video file from alternative CDN.
video.empty: Downloaded file is empty or too small.
video.large: Video is too large to send on WhatsApp.

gif.usage: Please provide a search term for GIF.
gif.no_gifs: No GIFs found for your search term.
gif.error: Failed to fetch GIF. Please try again later.

misc.error: ❌ Failed to generate image. Check your parameters and try again.

sudo.owner_only: ❌ Only owner can add/remove sudo. Use .sudo list to see.

broadcast.no_access: ❌ You don't have access to broadcast!

Please provide a valid WhatsApp number

pair.wait: Wait a moment for the code
pair.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
